title: Resident Evil: Extinction (2007) PAL DVD9
description:
Resident Evil: Extinction (2007)
--------------------------------
"We Have Witnessed The Beginning... We Have Seen The Apocalypse... Now We Face Extinction..."

IMDB: <a href="
http://imdb.com/title/tt0432021/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://imdb.com/title/tt0432021/</a>

Audio: English, Italian, Hindi (5.1)

Subs: Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Italian, Hindi, English
Subs for hearing-disabled: English

Extra Materials:
- Deleted Scenes.
- Sneak Peek of "Resident Evil: Degeneration";
  the first Resident Evil CGI feature film!
- Filmmaker&#039;s Commentary with Director Russell Mulcahy, Writer/Producer Paul W.S.
  Anderson and Producer Jeremy Bolt.
- "Beyond Raccoon City: Unearthing Resident Evil Extinction" Featurette.
- Alice Vision: Preproduction.
- The Big Bang: Shooting Resident Evil Extinction.
- Bigger, Faster, Stronger: The Undead Evolve.
- Vegas Visual Effects: Miniatures.


Plot outline:
Years after the Raccoon City disaster, Alice is on her own; aware that she has become a liability and could endanger those around her, she is struggling to survive and bring down the Umbrella Corporation led by the sinister Albert Wesker and head researcher Dr. Isaacs. Meanwhile, traveling through the Nevada Desert and the ruins of Las Vegas, Carlos Olivera, L.J., and new survivors K-Mart, Claire Redfield, and Nurse Betty must fight to survive extinction against hordes of zombies, killer crows and the most terrifying creatures created as a result of the deadly T-Virus that has killed millions.
